item.title: Southeast Asia is leading the way in digital transformation and digital leadership
item.description:
Source: SAP. Agree or disagree? Management and staff in Southeast Asia and globally share their thoughts in the Leaders 2020 study. Almost 25% of Southeast Asian companies are considered digital leaders, according to a recent study by SAP and Oxford Economics. This figure surpasses the global average of 16% reported in the Leaders 2020 study. This new category of high-achieving companies reports greater profit increases, improved employee engagement, and more inclusive workplace environments...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/southeast-asia-is-leading-the-way-in-digital-transformation-and-digital-leadership/

item.title: GP Batteries has created a unique powerbank for the SEA Games
item.description:
Source: GP Batteries. As the official battery partner for the SEA Games, GP Batteries has launched a limited-edition lithium-ion power bank to commemorate the upcoming games. This special power bank features a printed design of the 28th SEA Games Nila Logo and is officially recognized as an “Official Battery Partner” product. This power bank boasts a 10,400mAH capacity, making it perfect for charging smartphones and tablets. With two output ports, users can charge two devices concurrently while LED indicators display the remaining battery life...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/gp-batteries-has-created-a-unique-powerbank-for-the-sea-games/

item.title: Southeast Asia is a region where digital marketing is effective
item.description:
Source: Adobe website. Recent research from Adobe highlights the growing importance of mobile devices for marketers in Southeast Asia, emphasizing its effectiveness in customer interaction and engagement. This shift toward mobile-first business strategies is particularly prominent in the Asia Pacific region. Adobe’s Digital Index “Best of the Best Benchmark” for 2015 analyzed website performance across eight regions, including Southeast Asia. By comparing the top 20% of websites (“best of the best”) with the overall average across six key performance indicators, the research provides valuable insights into the strategies of high-performing digital marketing organizations...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/southeast-asia-is-a-region-where-digital-marketing-is-effective/

item.title: Experience sustainable dining at Avani properties in Indochina
item.description:
Image Credit: Avani. Plant-based coconut acai bowls are available at the Avani+ Samui Resort. To create a healthier planet and promote sustainability, Avani Hotels has introduced a variety of eco-friendly and wellness-focused programs. Avani’s flagship hotels in Thailand, Cambodia, and Laos are increasing their efforts to support nearby communities. They are accomplishing this by showcasing regional specialties and advocating for a decrease in reliance on imported goods. They have also implemented zero-waste programs, which include composting systems to handle all organic waste and on-site organic gardens to encourage self-sufficiency...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/experience-sustainable-dining-at-avani-properties-in-indochina/

item.title: The last adidas Originals = PHARRELL WILLIAMS collection of 2014 will be released on November 28th
item.description:
The last adidas Originals and Pharrell Williams collaboration of 2014 features a playful use of polka dots. More releases are planned for 2015. The bold and cheerful polka dot motif symbolizes energy and happiness. Source: adidas Originals. The Polka Dot Pack includes Stan Smith sneakers. Launching in Southeast Asia on November 28th, the Polka Dot Pack features leather Stan Smith sneakers. This collection embodies the profound joy of love. The youthful and optimistic designs aim for a relatable and authentic feel, representing the collaboration’s core value...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-last-adidas-originals-pharrell-williams-collection-of-2014-will-be-released-on-november-28th/

item.title: The FIRE movement is gaining popularity in Southeast Asia
item.description:
The FIRE (Financial Independence, Retire Early) movement is gaining traction in Southeast Asia. A Milieu Insight study discovered that over 60% of Southeast Asians anticipate retiring between the ages of 50 and 69. Source: Milieu Insight. Different FIRE strategies across Southeast Asia. Retiring before the age of 50 is a possibility for 60% of those surveyed, yet only 14% feel they are on track. Singaporeans are the most doubtful, with only 9% believing they are on track for early retirement...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-fire-movement-is-gaining-popularity-in-southeast-asia/
